job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-Augmented Full-Stack Principal Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
AI-Augmented Full-Stack Principal Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on full-stack web application development and cloud-native backends, with only a tangential mention of AI augmentation. It lacks specific details about AI model development, generative AI techniques, or MLOps, which are central to ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building and maintaining software applications, including front-end (web apps) and back-end services, along with code quality assurance, which are hallmarks of software development.

phrases: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, 'cloud-native backends' and 'serverless cloud patterns' with a specific cloud provider (AWS) touch upon the operational aspects of deploying and managing applications in a cloud environment, which is a component of MLOps.

phrases: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
soft_skills.justification: Code review implies communication about code quality, standards, and meeting requirements, which is a form of collaboration and communication.

phrases: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.
soft_skills.justification: The description implies solving technical challenges in building and enhancing applications, suggesting a problem-solving orientation. The focus on 'top-notch libraries and tools' and 'latest serverless cloud patterns' indicates a pragmatic approach to leveraging modern solutions.

phrases: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on using 'top-notch libraries and tools' and 'latest serverless cloud patterns' suggests a need to stay current with technology and adapt to new approaches.
